pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a backport of the zipfile module from Python 3.7, which contains someimprovements. Cloned from the 3.6 backport of Thomas Kluyver (https://gitlab.com/takluyver/zipfile36).Installation:: pip install zipfile37Suggested usage:.. code:: python if sys.version_info >= (3, 7): import zipfile else: import zipfile37 as zipfile
